/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are predominantly modern skyscrapers, their glass and steel facades reflecting the clear blue sky above. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along its length, adding a dynamic element to the scene. On either side of the street, lush green trees provide a stark contrast to the urban landscape, their leaves rustling in the unseen breeze. The image is bathed in the bright sunlight of the day, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. Despite the absence of people in the frame, the image conveys a sense of vibrancy and life, characteristic of a city that is always on the move.
